TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted peta cuts it down saying it's killing the invorment

i wish wish the iss had good internet connection (I am pretty sure they do)

Granted, they use up most of the planets bandwidth though

I wish I could go to Mars for real

Granted. You never wished for a spacesuit.

I'd really like a stone of Hematite. Don't ask why, though.

Granted. But now you can't recall why you wanted it in the first place...

I would like a hamburger.

Granted, but it has cost you 29.99$.

I wish there was a 0.99$ coin. I got ripped off so many times!!!

Granted, but it has no point because of things costing more than a dollar because of taxes.

I wish to have better handwriting (in Russian, my english handwriting is ok).

Granted. All your Russian-written letters are addressed to the Nepalese, though. (just picked a random non-European country, btw)

I wish I had the power to wish NullReferenceExceptions away.

Edited April 17, 2015 by B-STRK
Making post country-neutral

Granted, they are wished on to you.

I wish more NS heritage locomotives would come through my town.

Granted. They come in, but never out.

I wish I could meet David Wise. I need to learn from his wizardry!

Granted but his wizardry was to much and killed you.

I wish I had better internet.

Granted, your internet is so fast, your computer explodes.

i wish for automatic admin perms on every computer ever.

Granted you get caught logging on to. Military computer and are arrested for hacking into military computers

i wish to not die

Granted. Instead of dying textile products, you are sentenced to life in prison.

I wish for 20% of cheese.

Its a outdated spanish dollar

I wish for a poster of twilight sparkle

It features Edward instead of an alacorn.

- - - Updated - - -

Granted. Instead of dying textile products, you are sentenced to life in prison.

I wish for 20% of cheese.

Granted. 20% of it is green and smells like ....

I wish for a G4 My Little Pony holster for my .410 judge.... Without clop or gore....

Granted, the poor design of the holster prevents you from drawing the gun against a robber, and the flashy design draws his attention to it, leading to your untimely demise.

I wish for the ability to rewrite timelines and jump between them at will.

Granted. You accidentally rewrite the timeline of the events leading up to the computer's invention, causing it to not be invented at all, which means that your wish never existed.

I wish to buy a hambooger

Granted. It doesn't exist, so you wasted $1.49 in your currency.

I wish people would stop saying that the timeline can be changed. If you go back in time to do something, you already have, which led to the course of history to decide that you will go back in time to make those same changes. There's nothing you can do about that. It's set in stone.

Granted. Now no one makes fictional stories about time travel, and science-fiction stories no longer have a deus ex machina.

I wish for penny, chip, and used napkin.

Granted, but you eventually go outside and get attacked by a gorilla.

I wish for fish.

Granted. Sharknado!

I wish for a kerbalnado.

Granted, but you get eaten by it.

I wish for world peace

Granted you get the world in pieces

I wish for a quantum computer with no internet connection and only 1 sub slot for my perfect flash drive

Granted. You get yourself...

I wish I had better hearing. Mine is terrible [not being able to hear louder, but finer detail]

Granted. Your hearing is so good now, that you can clearly hear all the pop music from people's headphones from miles away! :-)

I wish for immorality.

Granted. Immoral people are now immortal.

I wish for less artificial coloring.
